feed.title: Current Watches, Warnings and Advisories for the United States Issued by the National Weather Service

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued October 13 at 4:30PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: A warm front will lift northward across the Gulf coast and Copper River Basin on Saturday. A wintry mix is likely, particularly during the morning hours. Trace ice accumulations are possible, leading to potentially hazardous travel conditions along the Richardson Highway between Glennallen and Valdez.
entry.cap:areaDesc: Copper River Basin; Northeast Prince William Sound

entry.title: Flood Warning issued October 13 at 9:20PM EDT until further notice by NWS
entry.summary: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Florida... St Johns River Near Astor affecting Lake and Volusia Counties. .The forecast point at Astor remains in Major Flood stage and is expected to slowly decline while remaining in Major Flood well into next week. Interests along the river will continue to see major flood impacts this week.

entry.title: Flood Warning issued October 13 at 9:18PM EDT until further notice by NWS
entry.summary: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Florida... St Johns River Near Deland affecting Lake and Volusia Counties. .The forecast point at Deland will remain within Major Flood stage through at least next week while very slowly declining. Interests along the river should expect these major flood impacts to continue. For the St. Johns River...including Deland...Major flooding is

entry.title: Flood Warning issued October 13 at 9:15PM EDT until further notice by NWS
entry.summary: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Florida... St Johns River Near Sanford affecting Seminole County. .The forecast point at Sanford is forecast to remain above Major Flood through early next week while slowly declining. Interests along the river will continue to see major flood impacts into next week.

entry.title: Flood Warning issued October 13 at 9:09PM EDT until further notice by NWS
entry.summary: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Florida... St Johns River Near Above Lake Harney affecting Seminole County. .The forecast point above Lake Harney at Geneva is experiencing major flooding. Despite a slow decline, the river level will remain in Major Flood stage through at least early next week. Interests along the river will continue to see major flood impacts.

entry.title: Flood Warning issued October 13 at 9:07PM EDT until further notice by NWS
entry.summary: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Florida... St Johns River Near Cocoa 9w affecting Brevard County. .Lingering high water from Hurricane Ian in late September will keep the Saint Johns River near Cocoa very near Moderate Flood stage threshold into Saturday, while very slowly declining at Minor Flood into next week.

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued October 13 at 3:51PM EDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Increased Fire Danger Friday... Winds from the southwest at 15 to 20 mph, with gusts over 30 mph, and afternoon relative humidities around 25 percent, will result in an increased fire danger on Friday afternoon. Any fires that start could spread out of control. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
